%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.expression:
IF(%ImagesCount% > 1,
    AND(
        OR(
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "gif",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "png",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
        ),
        OR(
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "gif",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "png",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|2:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
        )
    ),
    IF(%ImagesCount% = 1,
        OR(
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "jpg",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "gif",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "png",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "doc",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "docx",
            CASE(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, ".")[COUNT(SPLIT(%DocumentMethod:FileDocumentImage|1:filename%, "."))-1], LOWER) = "pdf"
        ),
        false
    )
)
